value:
$WmMPID_舞踏リネア,ch10_19_Linnea_F_Dance19,Face|Oh, my most sincere apologies!
I thought surely the two of you
were a couple...$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏イシュタル,ch06_11_Ishtar_F_Dance19,Face|Reinhardt is my protector. He has
been at my side since I was quite
young. He is...very important to me.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏リネア,ch10_19_Linnea_F_Dance19,Face|That must be it. I could tell the bond
between you two was strong even
from a distance... How wonderful!$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏イシュタル,ch06_11_Ishtar_F_Dance19,Face|Thank you. And likewise, you look
delightful together with your partner
as well.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ネフェニー,ch09_07_Nepenee_F_Dance19,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏イシュタル,ch06_11_Ishtar_F_Dance19,Face|And...who's this? No need to hide.
Please, come forward.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ネフェニー,ch09_07_Nepenee_F_Dance19,Face|Ah! I, umm... I must've been brought
here by some kind of mistake!$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏リネア,ch10_19_Linnea_F_Dance19,Face|My, how adorable you are! ...Ooh!
Will you try on this necklace? I think
it will suit you!$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ネフェニー,ch09_07_Nepenee_F_Dance19,Face|Ah... Well, umm...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_舞踏イシュタル,ch06_11_Ishtar_F_Dance19,Face|It would be wise for us to retreat for
now. We can reconvene with our
dancing partners.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ネフェニー,ch09_07_Nepenee_F_Dance19,Face|R-right.$k$p$Sbs150|
